Keep a spare set of keys in a hidden location outside your home in case you get locked out of the house.
Have a fully charged cell phone or a working landline phone and an emergency contact list with your loved ones to keep them informed and able to help if needed.
Install security cameras on your property to deter potential intruders and capture evidence if an incident occurs.
Consider enrolling in a self-defense or martial arts training to learn essential self-protection techniques.
Invest in a portable personal safety device, such as a pepper spray or a personal alarm, to use in case you encounter an attacker.
